Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Authorizes a thirty year retirement benefit for certain members in Nassau county
Summary: Authorizes a thirty year retirement benefit for certain members in Nassau county; provides a retirement allowance equal to 60 percent of a member's final average salary.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law, in relation to authorizing a thirty year retirement benefit for certain members in Nassau county
